about_the_game:
"Total Vengeance" is a gripping survival horror game that immerses players in a world of mystery, danger, and the unrelenting pursuit of survival. In this atmospheric and heart-pounding experience, players must navigate through a suspenseful narrative while mastering the art of resource gathering, puzzle solving, and combat to escape the clutches of an eerie and malevolent gas station.

Overview:

Uncover the chilling secrets of an abandoned gas station as you step into the shoes of a protagonist whose journey takes a harrowing turn when his truck breaks down near the station. As darkness falls, it becomes evident that the gas station holds a nightmarish secret that must be unraveled before it's too late. Survival hinges on your wits, courage, and determination to outwit the lurking terrors that await.

Key Features:

  • Engrossing Survival Horror: Immerse yourself in an intense survival horror experience where every corner conceals danger, and every choice can lead to life or death.

  • Exploration and Resource Management: Navigate an open-world environment teeming with hidden areas, puzzles, and clues. Scavenge for resources like food, water, and medical supplies while managing your inventory to survive the ordeal.

  • Engaging Narrative: Uncover a rich storyline through immersive gameplay and discover the interconnected stories of the characters who inhabited the gas station.

  • Terrifying Enemies: Confront mutated creatures, once-human entities twisted by the station's malevolent secret. Engage in intense combat or choose to evade and survive.

  • Realistic Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a meticulously designed environment that captures the eerie ambiance of an abandoned gas station and its surroundings.

  • Survival Mechanics: Keep your hunger, thirst, and radiation levels in check, making critical decisions to maintain your strength and vitality.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content:

The game includes depictions of violence, as it is set in a dark and dangerous environment where the player will encounter hostile creatures and engage in combat.
There are scenes that depict intense and suspenseful situations, adding to the overall atmosphere of fear and tension.
The storyline delves into themes of revenge and personal struggle, which may involve morally complex choices and emotional intensity.
Sensitive Topics:

We acknowledge that sexual assault and non-consensual sex are deeply sensitive and disturbing subjects. We want to assure potential players that such content is not present in "Total Vengeance." We understand the gravity of these topics and have intentionally chosen not to include them in the game.
Drug and alcohol abuse are not central themes in the game; however, they may be referenced in the environment or in the context of character backgrounds.
Self-harm is not depicted in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Fueling the desire for vengeance, players must survive against ghastly creatures, uncover the truth behind the gas station's abandonment, and confront their own inner demons. The choices made throughout the journey will shape their destiny, blurring the lines between redemption and revenge.
